author: duncf
msg: More documentation changes. Created "UPGRADE" to deal with upgrade
notes rather than sticking them in INSTALL. This is useful for Debian
since they've already installed SA, so we don't need to show them how;
yet upgrade issues are still relavent.

author: duncf
msg: Clarified user_prefs stuff. Was a debian patch

author: crossley
msg: Added some notes from Issue FOR-146 abou skinconfig changes.

author: duncf
msg: Added note about anti-From munging thingy in procmailrc.example
I'd had this as a debian specific patch before, but that's unnecessary!
